txt.en: Melethon is at the Causeway Forts.\n\nYou should speak to Melethon.

'We want to send in forces for a direct assault. The enemy have defensive barricades that will make this tactic difficult. You must go behind enemy lines to destroy these barricades before I command my soldiers to charge the Morgul forces.\n\n'Make sure not to direct too much attention as the enemy will be everywhere.'
Melethon has tasked you with destroying the enemy barricades scattered around Eastern Osgiliath to help push the enemy forces out of the city.
'You have done much for the Gondorian army. Victory will surely be ours!'
Enemy barricades can be found on the Eastern side of Osgiliath.\n\nYou should destroy enemy barricades.
